sentences.english: The consciousness equaled to praxis. The proletarian consciousness was the real motive of history.
sentences.chinese: 意识等同于实践，无产阶级意识是历史的真正动力。

sentences.english: They also put forward proletariate internationalism and patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 提出了无产阶级的国际主义和爱国主义的观点。

sentences.english: Sun Li is a proletarian writer.
sentences.chinese: 孙犁是一位无产阶级作家。

sentences.english: "Regardless the high-level or primary, our literary arts all for the people".
sentences.chinese: 我们是站在无产阶级的和人民大众的立场。

sentences.english: The Party organization is composed of the advanced elements of the proletariat.
sentences.chinese: 党组织是由无产阶级先进分子组成的。

sentences.english: Dr. norman bethune impersonates the spirit of proletarian internationalism.
sentences.chinese: 白求恩医生体现了无产阶级国际主义精神。

sentences.english: Revolutionaries should possess the noble qualities of the  proletariat.
sentences.chinese: 革命者应该具有无产阶级的崇高品质。

sentences.english: To persist in the proletarian stand is one aspect of the essence of socialist art and literature.
sentences.chinese: 坚持无产阶级立场是社会主义文艺的本质特征。

sentences.english: This situation increases the responsibility of the proletariat and its party for giving political leadership.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况，加重了无产阶级及其政党的政治领导责任。

sentences.english: The mass viewpoint is the basic viewpoints of the proletariat party.
sentences.chinese: 群众观点是无产阶级政党的基本观点。

sentences.english: Our army is the mainstay of the dictatorship of the proletariat in China.
sentences.chinese: 我们的军队是无产阶级专政的柱石。

sentences.english: The community of proletariat revolutionaries from Hunan develops from Hunan Xinmin Society.
sentences.chinese: 湘籍无产阶级革命家群体的起点是新民学会。

sentences.english: Marxist philosophy is scientific world outlook and methodology of proletariats.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义哲学是无产阶级的科学的世界观和方法论。

sentences.english: It was part of the world proletarian revolution of the time.
sentences.chinese: 五四运动是当时无产阶级世界革命的一部分。

sentences.english: So far as proletarian writers and artists are concerned, should not these kinds of creative moods be destroyed?
sentences.chinese: 对于无产阶级文艺家，这些情绪应不应该破坏呢？

sentences.english: Are the ideals of a capitalist society related to the needs of the proletariat?
sentences.chinese: 资本主义社会的理想与无产阶级的需要有关联吗？
